nodes.text: A song was composed some time before 22 BBY. A line from the song, "love is no match for a blaster by your side," was used as a colloquial phrase by that year. The planet of Coruscant's HoloNet News quoted the song thusly in "Balmorran Secures Musician Rearmament Contract", an article about a union of musicians called the Melody Fellowship that signed an arms deal with the droid manufacturer Balmorran Arms.

The song was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 56, that was published in-universe on the sixteenth day of the fifth month in 22 BBY. The article that referenced the song was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
